title: **Ring of Regeneration**
explicit_references: Magic Items > Ring of Mind Shielding > Ring of Regeneration
the *protection from evil and good* spell
rule_text:
#### **Ring of Regeneration**

*Ring, very rare (requires attunement)*

While wearing this ring, you regain 1d6 hit points every 10 minutes, provided that you have at least 1 hit point. If you lose a body part, the ring causes the missing part to regrow and return to full functionality after 1d6 + 1 days if you have at least 1 hit point the whole time.
rule_hierarchy: **Magic Items** > **Ring of Mind Shielding** > **Ring of Regeneration**
